languages.text: [Обратиться к Маражаю] "Я просто хотел{mf||а} взглянуть на тебя как следует. Униженного, потерявшего все. А потом... потом я найду способ тебя убить".
[Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к Маражаю] "Я просто хотел{mf||а} взглянуть на тебя как следует. Униженного, потерявшего все. А потом... потом я найду способ тебя убить".

traits.locale_text: [Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."
[Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."
[Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."
[Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."

languages.text: [对玛拉斋开口]“我只想好好看看你，看看你是怎么遭到羞辱，怎么失去一切的。在这之后……我会想个办法，宰了你。”
languages.original_text: [Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."

traits.locale_text: [对玛拉斋开口]“我只想好好看看你，看看你是怎么遭到羞辱，怎么失去一切的。在这之后……我会想个办法，宰了你。”

languages.text: [Vous adresser à Marazhai] « Je voulais seulement vous voir de plus près. Humilié, dépouillé de tout. Et plus tard... plus tard, je trouverai un moyen de vous tuer. »
languages.original_text: [Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser à Marazhai] « Je voulais seulement vous voir de plus près. Humilié, dépouillé de tout. Et plus tard... plus tard, je trouverai un moyen de vous tuer. »

languages.text: [Dirigirte a Marazhai] «Solo quería verte mejor. Humillado, despojado de todo lo que has sido. Y luego... encontraré la forma de matarte».
languages.original_text: [Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a Marazhai] «Solo quería verte mejor. Humillado, despojado de todo lo que has sido. Y luego... encontraré la forma de matarte».

languages.text: ［マラズハイに向き合う］「{mf|俺|私}はただ、お前をきちんと見たかっただけだ。屈辱にまみれ、すべてを剥ぎ取られたお前を。後で…お前の殺し方を考えよう」
languages.original_text: [Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."

traits.locale_text: ［マラズハイに向き合う］「{mf|俺|私}はただ、お前をきちんと見たかっただけだ。屈辱にまみれ、すべてを剥ぎ取られたお前を。後で…お前の殺し方を考えよう」

languages.text: [Marazhai ansprechen] "Ich wollte Euch aus der Nähe betrachten. Gedemütigt, Eures Wesens beraubt. Und später ... später werde ich einen Weg finden, Euch zu töten."
languages.original_text: [Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."

traits.locale_text: [Marazhai ansprechen] "Ich wollte Euch aus der Nähe betrachten. Gedemütigt, Eures Wesens beraubt. Und später ... später werde ich einen Weg finden, Euch zu töten."

languages.text: [Marazhai'a dön] "Sana şöyle iyice bir bakmak istedim. Küçük düşürülmüşsün, varın yoğun alınmış. Hele bir fırsat olsun... Fırsat olsun da seni öldürmenin bir yolunu bulurum."
languages.original_text: [Address Marazhai] "I just wanted to get a proper look at you. Humiliated, stripped of everything you were. And later... later I shall find a way to kill you."

traits.locale_text: [Marazhai'a dön] "Sana şöyle iyice bir bakmak istedim. Küçük düşürülmüşsün, varın yoğun alınmış. Hele bir fırsat olsun... Fırsat olsun da seni öldürmenin bir yolunu bulurum."
